sentences.english: I would like to refund this blender.
I would like to refund on this blender.
Put the bananas and ice cream in the blender.
sentences.chinese: 把香蕉和冰激凌放进果汁机。

sentences.english: The fresh milk is over there beside the juice machine.
sentences.chinese: 鲜奶在那儿，就在果汁机旁边。

sentences.english: I like this blender. Do you have a pink color?
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢这台果汁机。有粉红色的吗？

sentences.english: Put the bananas and ice cream into the blender.
sentences.chinese: 把香蕉和冰淇淋放进果汁机里。

sentences.english: Turn on the blender for about two minutes. (P.
sentences.chinese: 打开果汁机三分钟左右。

sentences.english: Pour the milk in the blender.
It's okay. I'll go to Ross', get the blender.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的，不碍事，我去找罗斯拿果汁机。

sentences.english: I like to blend fruit juice and yogurt in the blender.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢用果汁机把果汁和优格混在一起。

sentences.english: Put the banana and yogurt into the blender.
sentences.chinese: 将香蕉和酸奶放人果汁机。

sentences.english: It's very easy to make fruit juice with a blender.
sentences.chinese: 用果汁机来制作饮料非常容易。

sentences.english: Put the watermelon and yogurt into the blender.
sentences.chinese: 把西瓜和酸奶一起放入果汁机。

sentences.english: Turn on the blender for about two minutes. (P. 46)
sentences.chinese: 打开果汁机三分钟左右。

sentences.english: Then put the bananas and the ice cream into the blender.
sentences.chinese: 然后把香蕉和冰淇淋放进果汁机里。

sentences.english: Blend with2 cups crushed ice until smooth. Pour into champagne flute. Garnish with strawberry. Serves two.
sentences.chinese: 加碎冰果汁机混合入笛形香槟杯，饰草莓。

definition: to peel/to remove the skin/to tare
